content.query:
SELECT 
payment_type, payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedocsdp500.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/raw/payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
       
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [Payment_type]
    cross APPLY openjson(jsonContent)
    WITH( payment_type SMALLINT, payment_type_desc varchar(50)

    );
